name: Niwabi Enshou
description:
The Normal Attacks of the character to which this is attached deal +1 DMG, and the Physical DMG dealt becomes Pyro DMG.
After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack: Deal 1 Pyro DMG.
Usage(s): 3
